inPlayDescription: For every 3 HP of healing your characters receive, this card accumulates 1 Sea-Dyed Foam (maximum of 2).<span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">When this character deals DMG: Consume all Sea-Dyed Foam. DMG is increased by 1 for each Sea-Dyed Foam consumed.
